resources.string: The verification OTP has been sent to 99909909 via SMS
The verification code has been sent to your phone number
The verification code has been send to %s via sms
Please take a photo of the original card

To assess your profile and create tailored loan products, we need to get your permissions for accessing information on your Phone, SMS, Contacts, Location, SD card, and Calendar. All the information will be uploaded to our server (url https://srv.haikyfin.com) as the input of our credit model. SMS We require access to your SMS logs to verify your identity and create credit scoring models to determine what Loans can be offered to you in line with our responsible lending practices. We also use this data for purposes of collections and credit reporting as required by law. We will only access your SMS logs at the time of you applying for a loan and will not access your SMS logs anytime thereafter.All the information will be uploaded to our server (url https://srv.haikyfin.com) as the input of our credit model Contacts We require access to your contacts list in order to verify the emergency contact information provided by you. You acknowledge and agree that we may, from time to time, check your contact list to verify that the emergency contact information provided is current and up to date. We will access nor ustlise any other contact information apart from your designated emergency contact.All the information will be uploaded to our server (url https://srv.haikyfin.com) as the input of our credit model. Location We require access to your location in accordance with our anti-money laundering policies. As a responsible corporate entity, we take every measure to ensure that the use of our services is for legitimate and legal purposes only. In order to ensure the legality of the use of our services, we require access to your location to verify that you are accessing the services from within the borders of Pakistan and to ensure that the repayment of any loaned amounts emanate from within Pakistan and the funds are legitimate in nature. Calendar You agree that we must be granted access to your smartphone\'s calendar in order to input reminders pertaining to repayment dates of your loan. We will not extract nor view any information in your calendar and limit our actions to setting reminders Gallery We need to obtain your storage permission to ensure the normal operation of the program. Camera In order to effectively prevent fraudulent users, we need your kyc authentication when applying for loans. Please read the authorization carefully before using Haikyfin.
We are estimating your loan,Please pay attention to the review results on the App.
Sorry, You did not pass the review, please try again after 7 days
